title: Miranda8_1
author: Miranda8_1
content: Hi! Let me tell you about a mega game MetaKillers launching on Binance smart chain. The game, as I know, is a Play-to-earn strategy action battle game among gangsters and warriors. The game offers multiple player modes, from PVE, PVP,MMP and active participation in E-sport tournaments. Not only that, the MK projects has booster pools offering exciting staking options. Both, battle mode and Island mode of the game operates on $KILL token. I’m personally intrigued by the exciting gameplay and cinematics of MK.  So I’d suggest you all to tune in, and enjoy killing !

comments.author: JangoUnchained
comments.body: Yeah right,   coming from a newbie account, I think this is a wrong approach mate, it's better to create a ANN page about your project instead of trying to tell people about it, also I think there is a meta killers bounty campaign running presently, same project?

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Not the best time to launch a P2E project. For the most part, the market is oversaturated with these projects and the industry has shifted its focus a bit to another business model, Move-2-Earn, and P2E projects are now experiencing a drop in interest and users. Even the flagship of the industry, Axie Infinity, has lost most of its audience and its price has gone very deep. In bearish times, such game projects have little interest and can only survive if they have great marketing and an experienced team with an original product.

comments.author: BitcoinPanther
comments.body: If you are promoting an item, you can do better by giving links of the site.  Honestly pay to earn nft games is getting boring due to to current influx of this kind of game but looking at its whitepaper, the game concept looks interesting and claiming that it has an AAA  property.  Since they had a high budget, I wonder why they need to do a crowdfunding for its token when they can just integrate their token for in-game purchases.  I got interested but seeing they are into getting funds from their token initial public offering, I think this is just another money grab project.

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: Quote from: Miranda8_1 on May 24, 2022, 02:45:44 PM So I’d suggest you all to tune in, and enjoy killing !So what's suggestion? im sure that if you are only shilling for metakillers. You are saying like this game was  good but the fact that if this is really bad game. This token is not yet listed on CMC and how can we sure what you are saying was true? Better if you suggest the team to create the new announcement thread. In here people are dong their own research, When you are shilling without providing the proof and people will not believe it.

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Quote from: JangoUnchained on May 24, 2022, 03:37:43 PMYeah right,   coming from a newbie account, I think this is a wrong approach mate, it's better to create a ANN page about your project instead of trying to tell people about it, also I think there is a meta killers bounty campaign running presently, same project? hahaha this will become good project and will be replace bitcoin after gain peopl join and poof i am gone with million of dollar in a pocket and i do believe that account is developer account from the project

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: I have been digging a few information about your project,this is purely gimmick that you have made to attract people to come in your project. The fairlaunch is not even launched and so are you looking more buyers? Im feeling skeptical with your project. You have not even done KYC verification on pink sale. This may become another project to gamble or scam . i hope that people will think properly about this. What you are saying above was not true. The game has not even launched. This garbage game was even taking some characters from the existing game.

comments.author: Dave1
comments.body: Hmm, market is saturated now with this P2E, we are a in a bearish trend, and even the one that started it all has suffered a huge downturn regarding the price.So there's a lot of competition as I have said and I doubt that it will have the support and consensus of the market right now. Anyhow, let's see how it goes, but personally, I'm done with this hype already, might be better to just reinvest your profits (if you have), to other solid altcoins projects.

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: This is shit. People didn't even need a suggestion like that. If you wanna to tell everyone about your project and you should create your own announcement thread. Giving a good information about what already achieved by your project was good rather than saying everything developed by your project but it has zero achievement. I think that you are creating a useless thread now. Is not it better for you to did a better thing like promoting your project through various telegroup.

comments.author: Jackl87
comments.body: Quote from: Miranda8_1 on May 24, 2022, 02:45:44 PMHi! Let me tell you about a mega game MetaKillers launching on Binance smart chain. The game, as I know, is a Play-to-earn strategy action battle game among gangsters and warriors. The game offers multiple player modes, from PVE, PVP,MMP and active participation in E-sport tournaments. Not only that, the MK projects has booster pools offering exciting staking options. Both, battle mode and Island mode of the game operates on $KILL token. I’m personally intrigued by the exciting gameplay and cinematics of MK.  So I’d suggest you all to tune in, and enjoy killing !The title of your thread made it sound like you need a suggestion because you have a question or something or you need advice about a specific topic, that's why i clicked on it to see if i might be able to assist you a little, but it looks like this is just another blatant shill thread of a project that i have never heard of before. I understand if a team of a project is doing everything in order to promote it's project and to spread awareness about it but i really think that doing stuff like you just did will not really help you to attract new investors. I personally would never invest into a project that uses such shady methods of advertising and shilling to be honest, even if the project itself would be good. So stop doing that kind of stuff.

comments.author: Questat
comments.body: Quote from: Miranda8_1 on May 24, 2022, 02:45:44 PMHi! Let me tell you about a mega game MetaKillers launching on Binance smart chain. The game, as I know, is a Play-to-earn strategy action battle game among gangsters and warriors. Both, battle mode and Island mode of the game operates on $KILL token. I’m personally intrigued by the exciting gameplay and cinematics of MK.  So I’d suggest you all to tune in, and enjoy killing !If you could put some links where to find it that might gain some interest but, a newbie account is something hard to trust. I suggest to show us some proof of legality, maybe in that way it helps as many P2E are scam. People are just keen upon participating activities like this and so you can't blame why they are too many query and question. But if your intention is good and your platform is really working, that seems not problem.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Quote from: Miranda8_1 on May 24, 2022, 02:45:44 PMI’m personally intrigued by the exciting gameplay and cinematics of MK.  So I’d suggest you all to tune in, and enjoy killing !It's because you're probably one of these;* an investor and player of the game* part of the teamEither of the two, and that's why you're personally hooked on that game. To tell you honestly, the market isn't looking good for NFT/P2E games because most of them have been stomped by the bear.Also, the experience of others looking at these projects that have rug pulled makes them not curious anymore instead scared of investing into newer ones.

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: Your tittle was a click bait for me and anyone in here. You do know so well about what you have mentioned in your thread and so what suggestion that you are looking that from us. that doesn't even match with your title, In my opinion if you can write whole of information about metakiller and im sure you know everything about this. Why don't you just decide to invest in this token with your own risk? Im sure that if you also understood about the risk. It seems like to me if you are suggesting metakiller.

comments.author: WalkerIVIV
comments.body: always funny seeing a new projects always self proclaim themselves to be somewhat related with binance even if it isn't legitimate like calling themselves launching and partnering with binance smart chain although we all of course know that quite literally anyone could just launch their project in BSC like really easy.fairly speaking there are already tons and tons of gaming project released in binance, some of them are just shitcoins in disguise and the quality ones are really rare. I think amidst the bearish that we all currently in right now these gaming projects that already having saturated market hardly could strive.
